column1:
A car starts from rest and accelerates uniformly at a rate of 3 $ms^{-2}$.
a) What will be its velocity after 10 seconds?
b) How far will it travel in this time?

A ball is thrown horizontally with a speed of 15 $ms^{-1}$ from a height of 20 m.
a) How long will it take for the ball to hit the ground?
b) How far from the base of the building will the ball land?
What is the force of gravity on a 10 kg object at the surface of the Earth?
What is the kinetic energy of a 1 kg object moving at 10 m/s?
